alert.note: Alert for Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 13 at 5:17PM EDT until March 14 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 AM EDT Tuesday. * COASTAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Minor to locally moderate flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Some road closures are possible especially in vulnerable areas near Lindenhurst and Amityville. * SHORELINE IMPACTS...Breaking waves of 4 to 6 ft could result in beach erosion and flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT SOUTH BAY AT LINDENHURST NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/03 AM 3.4/ 3.9 1.8/ 2.2 2.1/ 2.6 0-1 MIN-MOD 14/03 PM 1.9/ 2.3 0.2/ 0.8 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 15/04 AM 2.2/ 2.7 0.6/ 1.1 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 15/06 PM 2.0/ 2.5 0.4/ 0.9 1.0/ 1.5 1 NONE 16/06 AM 2.7/ 3.2 1.2/ 1.7 1.5/ 2.0 1 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WEST SAYVILLE NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
